name: Compressed Poser Material File
summary: Learn about .MCZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Uncompressed Poser material files use either a .MC5 or .MC6 extension.
NOTE: Poser was originally developed by Smith Micro, but was sold to Bondware in June 2019.

description: Compressed material information file used by Poser's rendering engine; contains textures that can be applied to 3D models created with Poser; accessible only from the Library within the Material Room.
